title: Teen killed, another injured in drive-by shooting in North City - KMOV.com
content:
ST. LOUIS (KMOV.com) – A teenager was shot and killed in north St. Louis Monday night.
Seventeen-year-old Damani Aitch was found with a gunshot wound inside a car in the 5900 block of Emma around 6:50 p.m.
When police found Aitch, two other teenagers, described as being 16 and 17, were found on the scene. The 16-year-old had a laceration to the face and a gunshot wound to his hand. The 17-year-old was not injured.
An investigation revealed the victims were driving north on Riverview when unknown occupants of another vehicle fired shots into the rear of their vehicle.
Aitch was pronounced dead at the scene. The 16-year-old was hospitalized in stable condition.
